description: Clones a AHV virtual machine using Acropolis CLI

source.description: Name of source VM to clone

cores.description: Number of cores per vcpu of resulting VM (default: 1)

vcpus.description: Number of vcpus of resulting VM (default: 1)

ram.description: Number of Megabytes of ram of resulting VM (default: 1024)

key.description: SSH key that will assigned to the 'nutanix' user

domain.description: Domain name of new VM (default: local)

container.description: Storage container where VM is suppose to be stored (default: default)
